title: Big Caslon cursive ...from where?
content:
Do you know the beautiful cover design created by Paul Barnes for SchirmerGraf publishers? I think he uses Big Caslon roman and italic. Anyone knows where is Big Caslon italic available? Many thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019103634im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SchrimerGraf_Vizinczey_Cover_6701.jpg)
author: carlos_moreno_

comments.content:
Hi Carlos,

a search on Typophile brought up these threads:  
 [Big Caslon italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019103634/http:/typophile.com/node/44520)  
 [Swashy italic in Wallpaper - Big Caslon Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019103634/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1874)  
 [Big Caslon-like serif face on Penguin Books cover](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019103634/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29167)

What John Nolan said: See [http://www.carterandcone.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019103634/http:/www.carterandcone.com/ "http://www.carterandcone.com/") for contact info.

Another option is [Caslon 540 Italic with Swahes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019103634/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/caslon-italic-with-swashes/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DDie%2520%252Behn%2520Gebote%2520eines%2520Schri%25C2%25AEtstellers%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D43). You can access the swash z with the ‘+’ key, the f with long descender is hidden behind the ‘®’ (Gosh, do I love OpenType!).

F

Thank you very much, Florian. I made a search before posting,  
but obviously didn't make it well...

You’re welcome!  
The built-in search is broken. Try [Google](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019103634/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com/node/%20big%20caslon%20italic) and restrict your search to this site by adding <cite>site:typophile.com</cite> to your query.
Oh, and [ITC has an OpenType version of Caslon 540](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019103634/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/caslon_no_540_std_italic/), incl. swashes.
Thanks again for the tip and extra info
